column10: Please describe the incident in your own words
column16: Were weather conditions a likely factor?
column22: Would you be willing to share your contact information with local authorities?

column28: Do you want to use the same contact information as above?
column33: How did you hear about us?
column34: Please let us know where you heard about us?

column10: I was in the  S.Washington crosswalk as the lights on S. Washington were red.  There were two kids crossing ahead of me. Driver turned right from W. Annandale without slowing for the crosswalk.  She missed the kids by inches.

Traffic had stopped on S. Washington and I was crossing. Driver swung left from W. Annandale at high speed without stopping. I was just able to jump out of the way and she missed me by inches. If I was slower I would have been killed.
This is a difficult and unsafe crossing for pedestrians. Sight lines are poor, driving speeds are high, there are no pedestrian signals, and the road is wide.
column21: Often very high speeds at this intersection.
